email_text.subject: Novo obvestilo od {$siteTitle}
email_text.description: The email is sent to registered users that have selected to have this type of notification emailed to them.

email_text.subject: Novo obvestilo od {$siteTitle}
email_text.description: This email is sent to unregistered users on the notification mailing list.

email_text.subject: Dobrodošli na poštni seznam {$siteTitle}!
email_text.description: This email is sent to an unregistered user who just registered with the notification mailing list.

email_text.subject: Potrditev ponastavitve gesla
email_text.description: This email is sent to a registered user when they indicate that they have forgotten their password or are unable to login. It provides a URL they can follow to reset their password.

email_text.subject: Ponastavitev gesla
email_text.description: This email is sent to a registered user when they have successfully reset their password following the process described in the PASSWORD_RESET_CONFIRM email.

email_text.subject: Registracija pri publikaciji
email_text.description: This email is sent to a newly registered user to welcome them to the system and provide them with a record of their username and password.

email_text.subject: Potrditev vašega računa
email_text.description: This email is sent to a newly registered user to welcome them to the system and provide them with a record of their username and password.

email_text.subject: Registracija za recenzenta pri {$journalName}
email_text.description: This email is sent to a newly registered reviewer to welcome them to the system and provide them with a record of their username and password.

email_text.subject: Izid nove številke
email_text.description: This email is sent to registered readers via the "Notify Users" link in the Editor's User Home. It notifies readers of a new issue and invites them to visit the journal at a supplied URL.

email_text.subject: Archiving Request for {$journalName}
email_text.body:
Dear [University Librarian]
{$journalName} <{$journalUrl}>, is a journal for which a member of your faculty, [name of member], serves as a [title of position]. The journal is seeking to establish a LOCKSS (Lots of Copies Keep Stuff Safe) compliant archive with this and other university libraries.
[Brief description of journal]
The URL to the LOCKSS Publisher Manifest for our journal is: {$journalUrl}/gateway/lockss
We understand that you are already participating in LOCKSS. If we can provide any additional metadata for purposes of registering our journal with your version of LOCKSS, we would be happy to provide it.
Thank you, {$principalContactSignature}
email_text.description: This email requests the keeper of a LOCKSS archive to consider including this journal in their archive. It provides the URL to the journal's LOCKSS Publisher Manifest.

email_text.subject: Archiving Request for {$journalName}
email_text.body:
Dear [University Librarian]
{$journalName} <{$journalUrl}>, is a journal for which a member of your faculty, [name of member] serves as a [title of position]. The journal is seeking to establish a LOCKSS (Lots of Copies Keep Stuff Safe) compliant archive with this and other university libraries.
[Brief description of journal]
The LOCKSS Program <http://lockss.org/>, an international library/publisher initiative, is a working example of a distributed preservation and archiving repository, additional details are below. The software, which runs on an ordinary personal computer is free; the system is easily brought on-line; very little ongoing maintenance is required.
To assist in the archiving of our journal, we invite you to become a member of the LOCKSS community, to help collect and preserve titles produced by your faculty and by other scholars worldwide. To do so, please have someone on your staff visit the LOCKSS site for information on how this system operates. I look forward to hearing from you on the feasibility of providing this archiving support for this journal.
Thank you, {$principalContactSignature}
email_text.description: This email encourages the recipient to participate in the LOCKSS initiative and include this journal in the archive. It provides information about the LOCKSS initiative and ways to become involved.

email_text.subject: Potrditev oddaje prispevka
email_text.description: This email, when enabled, is automatically sent to an author when he or she completes the process of submitting a manuscript to the journal. It provides information about tracking the submission through the process and thanks the author for the submission.

email_text.subject: Neprimeren prispevek
Komentar k oddanemu prispevku
email_text.description: This email notifies the various people involved in a submission's editing process that a new comment has been posted.

email_text.subject: Odločitev o "{$articleTitle}"
email_text.description: This email notifies the reviewers of a submission that the review process has been completed. It includes information about the article and the decision reached, and thanks the reviewers for their contributions.

email_text.subject: Uredniška zadolžitev
email_text.description: This email notifies a Section Editor that the Editor has assigned them the task of overseeing a submission through the editing process. It provides information about the submission and how to access the journal site.

email_text.subject: Prošnja za recenzijo prispevka
email_text.description: This email from the Section Editor to a Reviewer requests that the reviewer accept or decline the task of reviewing a submission. It provides information about the submission such as the title and abstract, a review due date, and how to access the submission itself. This message is used when the Standard Review Process is selected in Journal Setup, Step 2. (Otherwise see REVIEW_REQUEST_ATTACHED.)

email_text.subject: Prošnja za recenzijo prispevka
email_text.description: This email from the Section Editor to a Reviewer requests that the reviewer accept or decline the task of reviewing a submission. It provides information about the submission such as the title and abstract, a review due date, and how to access the submission itself. This message is used when the Standard Review Process is selected in Journal Setup, Step 2, and one-click reviewer access is enabled.

email_text.subject: Prošnja za recenzijo prispevka
email_text.body:
{$reviewerName}:
Verjamem, da bi lahko bili odličen recenzent rokopisa "{$articleTitle}" in vas prosim, če lahko naredite to nalogo, ki je pomembna za nas. Spodaj so navodila za recenzijo za našo publikacijo, v priponki pa je prispevek. Vaša recenzija, skupaj s priporočilom, bi mi morali poslati po e-pošti do {$reviewDueDate}.
Prosim, če mi po e-pošti sporočite do {$weekLaterDate}, če ste pripravljeni narediti to recenzijo ali ne.
Hvala lepa za sprejetje prošnje.
{$editorialContactSignature}
Navodila za recenzijo
{$reviewGuidelines}
email_text.description: This email is sent by the Section Editor to a Reviewer to request that they accept or decline the task of reviewing a submission. It includes the submission as an attachment. This message is used when the Email-Attachment Review Process is selected in Journal Setup, Step 2. (Otherwise see REVIEW_REQUEST.)

email_text.subject: Prošnja za recenzijo prispevka
email_text.description: This email from the Section Editor to a Reviewer requests that the reviewer accept or decline the task of reviewing a submission for a second or greater round of review. It provides information about the submission such as the title and abstract, a review due date, and how to access the submission itself. This message is used when the Standard Review Process is selected in Journal Setup, Step 2. (Otherwise see REVIEW_REQUEST_ATTACHED_SUBSEQUENT.)

email_text.subject: Prošnja za recenzijo prispevka
email_text.body:
{$reviewerName}:
Ta e-pošta se nanaša na rokopis "{$articleTitle}", ki je v obravnavi pri publikaciji {$journalName}.
Po pregledu recenzije prejšnje verzije rokopisa, so avtorji oddali dopolnjeno verzijo prispevka. Prosimo vas, če nam lahko pomagate pri ponovni oceni prispevka.
Prosimo prijavite se na spletno stran publikacije do {$weekLaterDate} in potrdite ali zavrnite prošnjo za recenzijo. Enako lahko dostopate do prispevka in oddate vašo recenzijo in priporočilo.
Sama recenzija mora biti opravljena do {$reviewDueDate}.
URL povezava do prispevka: {$submissionReviewUrl}
Hvala lepa za sprejetje prošnje.
{$editorialContactSignature}
email_text.description: This email from the Section Editor to a Reviewer requests that the reviewer accept or decline the task of reviewing a submission for a second or greater round of review. It provides information about the submission such as the title and abstract, a review due date, and how to access the submission itself. This message is used when the Standard Review Process is selected in Journal Setup, Step 2, and one-click reviewer access is enabled.

email_text.subject: Prošnja za recenzijo prispevka
email_text.body:
{$reviewerName}:
Ta e-pošta se nanaša na rokopis "{$articleTitle}", ki je v obravnavi pri publikaciji {$journalName}.
Po pregledu recenzije prejšnje verzije rokopisa, so avtorji oddali dopolnjeno verzijo prispevka. Prosimo vas, če nam lahko pomagate pri ponovni oceni prispevka.
Spodaj so navodila za recenzijo za našo publikacijo, v priponki pa je prispevek. Vašo recenzija, skupaj s priporočilom, bi mi morali poslati po e-pošti do {$reviewDueDate}.
Prosim, če mi po e-pošti sporočite do {$weekLaterDate}, če ste pripravljeni narediti to recenzijo ali ne.
Hvala lepa za sprejetje prošnje.
{$editorialContactSignature}
Navodila za recenzijo
{$reviewGuidelines}
email_text.description: This email is sent by the Section Editor to a Reviewer to request that they accept or decline the task of reviewing a submission for a second or greater round of review. It includes the submission as an attachment. This message is used when the Email-Attachment Review Process is selected in Journal Setup, Step 2. (Otherwise see REVIEW_REQUEST_SUBSEQUENT.)

email_text.subject: Prošnja za preklic recenzije
email_text.body:
{$reviewerName}:
Odločili smo se, da prekličemo našo prošnjo za vapo recenzijo prispevka "{$articleTitle}" za publikacjo {$journalName}. Opravičujemo se vam za vse nevšečnosti, ki vam jih to lahko povzroči in upamo, da se lahko še obrnemo na vas pri uredniškem procesu publikacije tudi v prihodnje.
Če imate kakršnokoli vprašanje, se prosim obrnite name.
{$editorialContactSignature}
email_text.description: This email is sent by the Section Editor to a Reviewer who has a submission review in progress to notify them that the review has been cancelled.

email_text.subject: Potrditev recenzije
email_text.description: This email is sent by a Reviewer to the Section Editor in response to a review request to notify the Section Editor that the review request has been accepted and will be completed by the specified date.

email_text.subject: Ne morem opraviti recenzije
email_text.description: This email is sent by a Reviewer to the Section Editor in response to a review request to notify the Section Editor that the review request has been declined.

email_text.subject: Končana recenzija prispevka
email_text.description: This email is sent by a Reviewer to the Section Editor to notify them that a review has been completed and the comments and recommendations have been recorded on the journal web site.

email_text.subject: Zahvala za recenzijo prispevka
email_text.description: This email is sent by a Section Editor to confirm receipt of a completed review and thank the reviewer for their contributions.

email_text.subject: Opomnik za recenzijo prispevka
email_text.description: This email is sent by a Section Editor to remind a reviewer that their review is due.

email_text.subject: Opomnik za recenzijo prispevka
email_text.description: This email is sent by a Section Editor to remind a reviewer that their review is due.

email_text.subject: Avtomatski opomnik za recenzijo prispevka
email_text.description: This email is automatically sent when a reviewer's due date elapses (see Review Options under Journal Setup, Step 2) and one-click reviewer access is disabled. Scheduled tasks must be enabled and configured (see the site configuration file).

email_text.subject: Avtomatski opomnik za recenzijo prispevka
email_text.description: This email is automatically sent when a reviewer's due date elapses (see Review Options under Journal Setup, Step 2) and one-click reviewer access is enabled. Scheduled tasks must be enabled and configured (see the site configuration file).

email_text.subject: Uredniška odločitev
email_text.body:
{$authorName}:
Sprejeli smo odločitev glede vašega prispevka "{$articleTitle}" v publikacijo {$journalTitle}.
Naša odločitev je:
{$editorialContactSignature}
email_text.description: This email from the Editor or Section Editor to an Author notifies them of a final decision regarding their submission.

email_text.subject: Uredniška odločitev
email_text.body:
{$authorName}:
Sprejeli smo odločitev glede vašega prispevka "{$articleTitle}" v publikacijo {$journalTitle}.
Naša odločitev je:
{$editorialContactSignature}
email_text.description: This email from the Editor or Section Editor to an Author notifies them of a final decision regarding their submission.

email_text.subject: Uredniška odločitev
email_text.body:
{$authorName}:
Sprejeli smo odločitev glede vašega prispevka "{$articleTitle}" v publikacijo {$journalTitle}.
Naša odločitev je:
{$editorialContactSignature}
email_text.description: This email from the Editor or Section Editor to an Author notifies them of a final decision regarding their submission.

email_text.subject: Uredniška odločitev
email_text.body:
{$authorName}:
Sprejeli smo odločitev glede vašega prispevka "{$articleTitle}" v publikacijo {$journalTitle}.
Naša odločitev je:
{$editorialContactSignature}
email_text.description: This email from the Editor or Section Editor to an Author notifies them of a final decision regarding their submission.

email_text.subject: Prošnja za lektoriranje
email_text.description: This email is sent by a Section Editor to a submission's Copyeditor to request that they begin the copyediting process. It provides information about the submission and how to access it.

email_text.subject: Lektoriranje končano
email_text.body:
{$editorialContactName}:
Končali smo lektoriranje vašega prispevka "{$articleTitle}" za publikacijo {$journalName}. Za pregled predlaganih sprememb in vprašanj avtorju, sledite naslednjim korakom:
1. Prijavite se v publikacijo preko URL povezave spodaj z vašim uporabniškim imenom in geslom. 2. Kliknite na datoteko 1. prvotno lektoriranje za prenos in odprite lektorirano verzijo. 3. Preglejte lektoriranje, vse spremembe naredite z uporabo funkcionalnosti Sledi Spremembam v Wordu in odgovorite na vprašanja avtorju. 4. Shranite datoteko in jo naložite pod 2. Avtorjevo Lektoriranje. 5. Kliknite na ikono pod Končano in pošljite e-pošto uredniku.
To je zadnja priložnost, da naredite večje spremembe. Kasneje boste zaprošeni za pregled preloma, a v tem koraku bodo možne le še manjši popravki tipkarskih in oblikovnin napak.
URL povezava do rokopisa: {$submissionEditingUrl} Uproabniško ime: {$authorUsername}
Če v tem trenutku ne morete opraviti tega dela ali imate kakšno vprašanje, se prosim obrnite name. Hvala za vaš prispevek za to publikacijo.
{$copyeditorName}

email_text.subject: Zahvala za lektoriranje
email_text.description: This email is sent by the Section Editor to a submission's Copyeditor to acknowledge that the Copyeditor has successfully completed the copyediting process and thank them for their contribution.

email_text.subject: Prošnja za pregled lektoriranja
email_text.body:
{$authorName}:
Prvi korak lektoriranja vašega prispevka "{$articleTitle}" za publikacijo {$journalName} je končan in na voljo, da ga pregledate preko spodnjih korakov:
1. Kliknite na URL povezavo do prispevka spodaj. 2. Prijavite se v publikacijo in kliknite na datoteko pod korakom 1. 3. Odprite prenešen prispevek. 4. Preglejte besedilo, skupaj z lektorskimi prispevki in vprašanji avtorju. 5. Naredite vse lektorske spremembe, ki bodo še izboljšale besedilo. 6. Ko končate, naložite datoteko pod korak 2. 7. Kliknite na metapodatke, da preverite celovitost in pravilnost podatkov za indeksiranje. 8. Pošljite e-pošto o končanju uredniku in lektorju.
URL povezava do prispevka: {$submissionCopyeditingUrl} Uporabniško ime: {$authorUsername}
To je zadnja priložnost, da naredite večje spremembe. Kasneje boste zaprošeni za pregled preloma, a v tem koraku bodo možne le še manjši popravki tipkarskih in oblikovnih napak.
Če v tem trenutku ne morete opraviti tega dela ali imate kakšno vprašanje, se prosim obrnite name. Hvala za vaš prispevek za to publikacijo.
{$editorialContactSignature}
email_text.description: This email is sent by the Section Editor to a submission's Author to request that they proofread the work of the copyeditor. It provides access information for the manuscript and warns that this is the last opportunity the author has to make substantial changes.

email_text.subject: Pregled lektoriranja je končano
email_text.description: This email is sent by the Author to the Section Editor to notify them that the Author's copyediting process has been completed.

email_text.subject: Zahvala za pregled lektoriranja
email_text.description: This email is sent by the Section Editor to a submission's Author to confirm completion of the Author's copyediting process and thank them for their contribution.

email_text.subject: Zadnje lektoriranje prispevka
email_text.description: This email from the Section Editor to the Copyeditor requests that they perform a final round of copyediting on a submission before it enters the layout process.

email_text.subject: Končno lektoriranje končano
email_text.description: This email from the Copyeditor to the Section Editor notifies them that the final round of copyediting has been completed and that the layout process may now begin.

email_text.subject: Zahvala za zadnje lektoriranje
email_text.description: This email from the Section Editor to the Copyeditor acknowledges completion of the final round of copyediting and thanks them for their contribution.

email_text.subject: Prošnja za prelom
email_text.description: This email from the Section Editor to the Layout Editor notifies them that they have been assigned the task of performing layout editing on a submission. It provides information about the submission and how to access it.

email_text.subject: Prelom končan
email_text.body:
{$editorialContactName}:
Prelom prispevka "{$articleTitle}" za publikacijo {$journalName} je končan in pripravljen za korekcijo.
Če imate kakšna vprašanja, se prosim obrnite name.
{$layoutEditorName}
email_text.description: This email from the Layout Editor to the Section Editor notifies them that the layout process has been completed.

email_text.subject: Zahvala za prelom
email_text.description: This email from the Section Editor to the Layout Editor acknowledges completion of the layout editing process and thanks the layout editor for their contribution.

email_text.subject: Prošnja za korekturo (avtor)
email_text.description: This email from the Section Editor to the Author notifies them that an article's galleys are ready for proofreading. It provides information about the article and how to access it.

email_text.subject: Korektura končana (avtor)
email_text.description: This email from the Author to the Proofreader and Editor notifies them that the Author's round of proofreading is complete and that details can be found in the article comments.

email_text.subject: Zahvala za korekturo (avtor)
email_text.body:
{$authorName}:
Hvala lepa za korekturo preloma vašega prispevka "{$articleTitle}" v publikaciji {$journalName}. Veselimo se skorajšnje objave vašega dela.
Če se naročite na obvestila, boste prejeli e-pošto s kazalom vsebine, takoj ko bo objavljen. Če imate kakšna vprašanja, se obrnite name.
{$editorialContactSignature}
email_text.description: This email from the Section Editor to the Author acknowledges completion of the initial proofreading process and thanks them for their contribution.

email_text.subject: Prošnja za korekturo
email_text.description: This email from the Section Editor to the Proofreader requests that they perform proofreading of an article's galleys. It provides information about the article and how to access it.

email_text.subject: Korektura končana
email_text.description: This email from the Proofreader to the Section Editor notifies them that the Proofreader has completed the proofreading process.

email_text.subject: Zahvala za korekturo
email_text.description: This email from the Section Editor to the Proofreader confirms completion of the proofreader's proofreading process and thanks them for their contribution.

email_text.subject: Prošnja za korekturo (grafični urednik)
email_text.description: This email from the Section Editor to the Layout Editor notifies them that an article's galleys are ready for final proofreading. It provides information on the article and how to access it.

email_text.subject: Korektura končana (grafični urednik)
email_text.description: This email from the Layout Editor to the Section Editor notifies them that the final stage of proofreading has been completed and the article is now ready to publish.

email_text.subject: Zahvala za korekturo (grafični urednik)
email_text.description: This email from the Section Editor to the Layout Editor acknowledges completion of the final stage of proofreading and thanks them for their contribution.

email_text.subject: Zanimiv prispevek
email_text.body: Zdelo se mi je, da vas morda zanima prispevek "{$articleTitle}" avtorja {$authorName} objavljen v zvezku {$volume}, številka {$number} ({$year}) publikacije {$journalName} na voljo na URL povezavi "{$articleUrl}".
email_text.description: This email template provides a registered reader with the opportunity to send information about an article to somebody who may be interested. It is available via the Reading Tools and must be enabled by the Journal Manager in the Reading Tools Administration page.

email_text.subject: Subscription Notification
email_text.body:
{$subscriberName}:
You have now been registered as a subscriber in our online journal management system for {$journalName}, with the following subscription:
{$subscriptionType}
To access content that is available only to subscribers, simply log in to the system with your username, "{$username}".
Once you have logged in to the system you can change your profile details and password at any point.
Please note that if you have an institutional subscription, there is no need for users at your institution to log in, since requests for subscription content will be automatically authenticated by the system.
If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me.
{$subscriptionContactSignature}
email_text.description: This email notifies a registered reader that the Manager has created a subscription for them. It provides the journal's URL along with instructions for access.

email_text.subject: Issue Now Open Access
email_text.description: This email is sent to registered readers who have requested to receive a notification email when an issue becomes open access.

email_text.subject: Notice of Subscription Expiry
email_text.description: This email notifies a subscriber that their subscription will soon expire. It provides the journal's URL along with instructions for access.

email_text.subject: Subscription Expired
email_text.description: This email notifies a subscriber that their subscription has expired. It provides the journal's URL along with instructions for access.

email_text.subject: Subscription Expired - Final Reminder
email_text.description: This email notifies a subscriber that their subscription has expired. It provides the journal's URL along with instructions for access.

email_text.subject: Subscription Purchase: Individual
email_text.description: This email notifies the Subscription Manager that an individual subscription has been purchased online. It provides summary information about the subscription and a quick access link to the purchased subscription.

email_text.subject: Subscription Purchase: Institutional
email_text.description: This email notifies the Subscription Manager that an institutional subscription has been purchased online. It provides summary information about the subscription and a quick access link to the purchased subscription.

email_text.subject: Subscription Renewal: Individual
email_text.description: This email notifies the Subscription Manager that an individual subscription has been renewed online. It provides summary information about the subscription and a quick access link to the renewed subscription.

email_text.subject: Subscription Renewal: Institutional
email_text.description: This email notifies the Subscription Manager that an institutional subscription has been renewed online. It provides summary information about the subscription and a quick access link to the renewed subscription.

email_text.subject: Urejanje citiranja
email_text.description: This email allows copyeditors to request additional information about references from authors.

email_text.subject: {$giftNoteTitle}
email_text.description: This email notifies a gift recipient that a gift has been purchased and is available for redemption.

email_text.subject: Redeem Your Gift: Login Details
email_text.description: This email notifies a gift recipient of their login details for a new account.

email_text.subject: Redeem Your Gift: Login Details
email_text.description: This email notifies a gift recipient of their login details.

email_text.subject: Posodobljena verzija je naložena
email_text.description: This email is automatically sent to the assigned editor when author uploads a revised version of an article.
